attributes.action: To remove from their jobs Sharon Shoesmith, Chair of Harringey Childrens Board, Clive Preece, Service Manager at Harringey Council Maria Ward social worker at Harringey Council assigned to Baby P and Dr Subah Al-Zayyat Dr who missed Baby Ps 8 fractured ribs and broken back.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The tortuous and prolonged death of baby P could have been avoided if the above named had done the job that they are trained and paid to do.  Their complete lack of common sense, perception and care contributed to his agony and death.  Their positions are that of the care of the vulnerable and we place our trust in them.  They failed monumentally and therefore should be removed from their positions and not allowed to work in this industry again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
